channel.title: Veronika Zimmer on AI in Medicine
channel.description: Recent content in Veronika Zimmer on AI in Medicine

item.title: MSc Thesis: Distributionally robust neural networks in medical imaging
item.description: Deep learning has revolutionized the field of medical imaging. However, the performance of a model drops when the distribution of the test data is different from the distribution of the training data.

item.title: MSc Thesis: Out-of-distribution detection using contrastive training for medical imaging
item.description: Deep learning has revolutionized the field of medical imaging. However, the performance of a model drops when the distribution of the test data is different from the distribution of the training data.
